project.name: CloudKid States API
project.description: CloudKid States API: a library providing base classes for making various gamestates

BaseState.name: BaseState
BaseState.description: Defines the base functionality for a state used by the state manager

params.name: panel
params.description: The panel to associate with this panel

StateEvent.name: StateEvent
StateEvent.description: A state-related event used by the State Manager

params.name: type
params.description: See createjs.Event

params.name: currentState
params.description: The currentState of the state manager

params.name: visibleState
params.description: The current state being transitioned or changing visibility, default to currentState

StateManager.name: StateManager
StateManager.description: The State Manager used for manaing the different states of a game or site

params.name: transition
params.description: The transition MovieClip to play between transitions

params.name: audio
params.description:
Data object with aliases and start times (seconds) for transition in, loop and out sounds: {in:{alias:"myAlias", start:0.2}}.
		These objects are in the format for Animator or PixiAnimator from CloudKidAnimation, so they can be the alias instead of an object.

classitems.description: Adds the specified event listener
classitems.name: addEventListener

params.name: type
params.description: The string type of the event

params.name: listener
params.description: An object with a handleEvent method, or a function that will be called when the event is dispatched

return.description: Returns the listener for chaining or assignment

classitems.description: Removes the specified event listener
classitems.name: removeEventListener

params.name: type
params.description: The string type of the event

params.name: listener
params.description: The listener function or object

classitems.description: Removes all listeners for the specified type, or all listeners of all types
classitems.name: removeAllEventListeners

params.name: type
params.description: The string type of the event. If omitted, all listeners for all types will be removed.

classitems.description: Dispatches the specified event
classitems.name: dispatchEvent

params.name: enventObj
params.description: An object with a "type" property, or a string type

params.name: target
params.description: The object to use as the target property of the event object

return.description: Returns true if any listener returned true

classitems.description: Indicates whether there is at least one listener for the specified event type
classitems.name: hasEventListener

params.name: type
params.description: The string type of the event

return.description: Returns true if there is at least one listener for the specified event

classitems.description: Createjs EventDispatcher method
classitems.name: _listeners description

classitems.description: The id reference
classitems.name: stateID

classitems.description: A reference to the state manager
classitems.name: manager

classitems.description: Save the panel
classitems.name: panel

classitems.description: Check to see if we've been destroyed
classitems.name: _destroyed

classitems.description: If the manager considers this the active panel
classitems.name: _active

classitems.description: If we are pre-loading the state
classitems.name: _isLoading

classitems.description: If we canceled entering the state
classitems.name: _canceled

classitems.description: When we're finishing loading
classitems.name: _onEnterStateProceed

classitems.description: If we are currently transitioning
classitems.name: isTransitioning

classitems.description: Initialize the Base State
classitems.name: initialize

params.name: panel
params.description: The panel

classitems.description: Status of whether the panel load was canceled
classitems.name: getCanceled

classitems.description: This is called by the State Manager to exit the state
classitems.name: _internalExitState

classitems.description: When the state is exited
classitems.name: exitState

classitems.description: Exit the state start, called by the State Manager
classitems.name: _internalExitStateStart

classitems.description: When the state has requested to be exit, pre-transition
classitems.name: exitStateStart

classitems.description: Exit the state start, called by the State Manager
classitems.name: _internalEnterState

params.name: proceed
params.description: The function to call after enterState has been called

classitems.description: Internal function to start the preloading
classitems.name: loadingStart

classitems.description: Internal function to finish the preloading
classitems.name: loadingDone

classitems.description: Cancel the loading of this state
classitems.name: _internalCancel

classitems.description:
Cancel the load, implementation-specific
this is where any async actions are removed
classitems.name: cancel

classitems.description: When the state is entered
classitems.name: enterState

classitems.description: Exit the state start, called by the State Manager
classitems.name: _internalEnterStateDone

classitems.description:
When the state is visually entered fully
that is, after the transition is done
classitems.name: enterStateDone

classitems.description: StateManager updates the state
classitems.name: update

params.name: elasped
params.description: The second since the last frame

classitems.description: Get if this is the active state
classitems.name: getActive

return.description: If this is the active state

classitems.description: Transition the panel in
classitems.name: transitionIn

classitems.description: Transition the panel out
classitems.name: transitionOut

classitems.description: Get if this State has been destroyed
classitems.name: getDestroyed

classitems.description: Enable this panel, true is only non-loading and non-transitioning state
classitems.name: setEnabled

params.name: enabled
params.description: The enabled state

classitems.description: Get the enabled status
classitems.name: getEnabled

classitems.description: Don't use the state object after this
classitems.name: destroy

classitems.description: The name of the event for when the state starts transitioning in
classitems.name: onTransitionStateIn

classitems.description: The name of the event for when the state finishes transition in
classitems.name: onTransitionStateInDone

classitems.description: The name of the event for when the state starts transitioning out
classitems.name: onTransitionStateOut

classitems.description: The name of the event for when the state is done transitioning out
classitems.name: onTransitionStateOutDone

classitems.description: When the state besome visible
classitems.name: onVisible

classitems.description: When the state becomes hidden
classitems.name: onHidden

classitems.description: A reference to the current state of the state manager
classitems.name: currentState

classitems.description: A reference to the state who's actually being transitioned or being changed
classitems.name: visibleState

params.description: The type of event

classitems.name: _queueStateId

classitems.name: onTransitionIn

classitems.description: Initialize the State Manager
classitems.name: intialize

params.name: transition
params.description: The transition MovieClip to play between transitions

params.name: transitionSounds
params.description: Data object with aliases and start times (seconds) for transition in, loop and out sounds: {in:{alias:"myAlias", start:0.2}}

classitems.description: Register a state with the state manager, done initially
classitems.name: addState

params.name: id
params.description: The string alias for a state

params.name: state
params.description: State object reference

classitems.description: Dynamically change the transition
classitems.name: changeTransition

params.name: Clip
params.description: to swap for transition

classitems.description: Get the currently selected state
classitems.name: getState

return.description: The id of the current state

classitems.description: Get the current selected state (state object)
classitems.name: getCurrentState

classitems.description: Access a certain state by the ID
classitems.name: getStateById

params.name: id
params.description: State alias

classitems.description: If the StateManager is busy because it is currently loading or transitioning.
classitems.name: isBusy

classitems.description:
If the state needs to do some asyncronous tasks,
The state can tell the manager to stop the animation
classitems.name: loadingStart

classitems.description:
If the state has finished it's asyncronous task loading
Lets enter the state
classitems.name: loadingDone

classitems.description: Show, enable the blocker clip to disable mouse clicks
classitems.name: showBlocker

classitems.description: Re-enable interaction with the stage
classitems.name: hideBlocker

classitems.description:
This transitions out of the current state and 
enters it again. Can be useful for clearing a state
classitems.name: refresh

classitems.description: Set the current State
classitems.name: setState

params.name: id
params.description: The state id

classitems.description:
When the state has completed it's loading sequence
this should be treated as an asyncronous process
classitems.name: _onStateLoaded

classitems.description: Process the state queue
classitems.name: _processQueue

return.description: If there is a queue to process

classitems.description:
Plays the animation "transitionLoop" on the transition. Also serves as the animation callback.
Manually looping the animation allows the animation to be synced to the audio while looping.
classitems.name: _loopTransition

classitems.description: Displays the transition out animation, without changing states.
classitems.name: showTransitionOut

params.name: callback
params.description: The function to call when the animation is complete.

classitems.description: Displays the transition in animation, without changing states.
classitems.name: showTransitionIn

params.name: callback
params.description: The function to call when the animation is complete.

classitems.description: Generalized function for transitioning with the manager
classitems.name: _transitioning

params.name: The
params.description: animator event to play

params.name: The
params.description: callback function after transition is done

classitems.description: The frame update function
classitems.name: update

params.name: elasped
params.description: The ms since the last frame

classitems.description: Remove the state manager
classitems.name: destroy
